column5: Just a heads up boys and girls Canadian Tire has a great deal on a Automatic battery charger 1/2 price.
Links,we need links. I was there today and didnt see it.
In todays CTC flyer sale starts tomorrow!  I can`t post links that`s to high tech for me.

I did not see 50% off, but this is in the flyer for this week at 30% off:  http://www.canadiantire.ca/browse/product_...D=1184359465566   Also a half decent deal on a Colour GPS unit:  http://www.canadiantire.ca/browse/product_...D=1184359349225
You might be a redneck if...
If anyone wants a decent charger at a good price, check out the first link in Dutch's post. I bought the exact same one last Saturday for $99.99.......this week it's $69.99.
Hey,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,back off the redneck. Yer cool with me lookinforwalleye.Even if yer one eye is looking at me screwy,LOL   Thanks for the links Dutch. Was hopeing it was a two bank charger.
Would a charger like the one advertised work for a deep cycle battery?  I'm considering buying a small trolling motor for my canoe, a deep cycle battery and a charger.

I have (errr...had) one like the $44.99 special.  Past tense as it didn't last a full season.  I think those are made for lawn mowers and tractors on cold mornings, not for repeated abuse topping up deep cycles and cranking batteries.
Picked one up today,awesome deal  BM
